name: In Deep Space
description:
In the quest of searching for an unknown anomaly from another Galaxy, cosmonauts Axy and Gal are sent on a mission together.

As a duo, take advantage of your knowledge with the Periodic Table of Elements to defend, repair your ship and to repel hostilities by combining Elements and Compounds inserted in Lab Machines.

Message from the Devs:

Thank you for playing our game! This was a capstone/thesis game built with-in 2 -3 months. We hope you will have a fun ride with your buddy playing our game.

Notes: 2 Controllers are required to play
